getAllRankings().details: Get all rankings for off-chain analysis Returns arrays of rankers and their corresponding rankings

getRankingsBatch(uint256,uint256).details: Get rankings in batches for large datasets

params.limit: Maximum number of rankings to return

getUserVoteTimestamp(address).details: Get the timestamp when a user last voted

hasUserVoted(address).details: Check if a user has submitted a ranking

updateRanking((uint256,bool)[]).details: Update user's ranking with structured data supporting ties

params.newRanking: Array of RankingEntry structs with tie information
